scripts.build: bun --filter='!@compile-test-bun-application/universal-sdk' run build && bun --filter='@compile-test-bun-application/universal-sdk' run build
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules bun.lockb bun.lock && bun --filter='*' clean
scripts.database:setup: bun run build && bun migrate:init && bun migrate:up && bun seed
scripts.migrate:create: docker compose up -d postgresql && bun --filter='*' run migrate:create
scripts.migrate:down: docker compose up -d postgresql && bun --filter='*' run migrate:down
scripts.migrate:init: docker compose up -d postgresql && sleep 5 && bun --filter='*' run migrate:init
scripts.migrate:up: docker compose up -d postgresql && bun --filter='*' run migrate:up
scripts.seed: docker compose up -d postgresql && bun --filter='*' run seed
